name: Avatar Maker: Anime Chibi
description:
With this app, it only takes a few minutes to create a one-of-a-kind chibi character. Set your character’s gender, profession, and appearance. Add awesome accessories, name your anime character, and you're done! Save it to a gallery and share it with your social network friends or set it as your avatar. If you think our editor doesn’t have enough options, email your character to yourself and keep editing it on your computer.
Come up with your own stories about your chibi characters and make comic strips out of them!
And make sure you send us your reviews. We’d love to add new items at your request. Have fun, and be creative!
